title: Sqaure Linotype
content:
Hello Everyone,  
Thanks for helping me out previously.

I am looking for the font face of the Word " Bar " & "Courtyard" .  
If the font face of "PEWS" someone can suggest that is the surplus.

I have tried my personal resources and was come near to "Speculum (Regular)"; which is definitely not the correct font face.

Thanks everyone for helping or even looking.

Regards,  
Hash

Font: 

 Eurostile Extended #2 

Solved By: 

 [Les ONeill](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416032108/http:/typophile.com/user/216897 "View user profile.")
author: hasnain125

comments.content: Looks like Eurostile Extended (sorry, pews I don't know)
